description: Located in the heart of the lower east side, you're surrounded by many great restaurants, nightlife and entertainment venues. Our studio is less than 2 minute walk to the F,M,J,Z trains and only 8 minute walk to the B D express station. You can get anywhere you want in the city while saving a lot of time on commute. There are also citibike stations, which are conveniently located around almost every corner. Supermarket and Laundry is right next door.
name: Cozy Private home in LES Manhattan
review: The place is in a very noisy location, we needed to buy earplugs.
